text: Tini balalena, “nihsandeha tini balachena, seti niscaya'i emana bachura yake joyale jota haya ni jami casa karate, ba ksete pani'o deya na, sahi-salamata, yara madhye kona khutam ne'i.” Tara balale -- “ebara tumi puropuri satya niye esecho.” Sutaram tara take kurabani karala, ara dekhalo na ye tara karala.
